channel.title: RunServer wont work
channel.description:
Well, I just downloaded JDK and JRE 6 Update 21. I did my classpath variables blah blah. I downloaded fr33sc4p3 pkz, i try to run it and it just closes instantly after i click the runserver. I got a screenie of what it says tho,
[b]ERROR:[/b]
[IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/xdgmyb.png[/img]
Below are my classpath variable screenshots, and codes.
[IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/2ugea7k.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/1qpbtf.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/5vcen7.png[/img]
[code]CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin;%CLASSPATH%;[/code]
[code]C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin;[/code]
PLEASE HELP WITH THIS?

item.title: RunServer wont work
item.dc:creator: @GoldenScape GoldenScape
item.description:
@GoldenScape wrote:

I Vain I:

You’re on a 64-bit operating system, trying to use 32-bit Java with 32-bit variables?

Oh shit, i totally didn’t see the options for “Windowsx64” or whatever. I’ll try that and see. Thanks!

Read full topic
